coaches.name: Jordan Orr
coaches.description: With over 15 years of coaching experience, Jordan brings a wealth of knowledge to our team. He holds a UEFA B License and has a passion for developing young talent.

coaches.name: Arron Lindsay
coaches.description: Arron is a former professional player with a keen eye for tactics. He specializes in offensive strategies and helps our players develop their attacking skills.

coaches.name: Kyle McAusland
coaches.description: Kyle is a certified strength and conditioning specialist. He designs age-appropriate fitness programs to improve our players' stamina, speed, and overall physical performance.

coaches.name: Stewart Kean
coaches.description: Stewart is a former professional goalkeeper with international experience. He focuses on developing our goalkeepers' technique, positioning, and decision-making skills.
